name: boekdichtbij-lambdas
description: Lambda handlers for BoekDichtbij: deadline enforcement, wave2 dispatch
comment:dependencies: Stripe v14 pinned intentionally (app root uses v20). Upgrade when ready to align API versions.

scripts.build: npm run build:deadline && npm run build:wave2
scripts.package:deadline: npm run build:deadline && cd dist && zip -r ../assignment-deadline.zip assignment-deadline.js
scripts.package:wave2: npm run build:wave2 && cd dist && zip -r ../wave2-dispatch.zip wave2-dispatch.js
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../assignment-deadline.zip assignment-deadline.js && zip -r ../wave2-dispatch.zip wave2-dispatch.js
